original_title: 没有哪个夏天像今年一样
overview: In the summer of 2019, 18-year-old Wang Yuan released his first solo album, which he co-wrote, and also held his first solo concert. Then he stepped off the stage, packed his bags and flew across the ocean to study at Berklee College of Music, alone. It was a summer of turning around, a momentous decision.
title: 没有哪个夏天像今年一样
